reviews.name: Josh Cave
reviews.text: Very professional and got the job done quick. Highly recommend

reviews.name: Lewis McFarland
reviews.text: Always a great service and will always be my go-to. Will always recommend over and above anyone else I’ve used in the past

reviews.name: Yvonne Boret
reviews.text: Great and efficient service. The plumber was very polite, friendly and completed the job very well. He also cleaned up after he finished the job. I will definitely use DPMS in the future.

reviews.name: Caroline Lowrie
reviews.text: Came out on a Saturday afternoon, fixed our boiler and saved us from what would have been week a very cold weekend.

reviews.name: Tim Keys
reviews.text: I highly recommend Reece and his teams at DPMS. Have used a few times for boiler issues and a gas fire and each time they gave honest upfront advice before starting any work. Great service.

reviews.name: Nicholas Michael Leslie Lowe
reviews.text: K J Heating provided exceptional service! I called them for a plumbing issue, and they were quick to respond and scheduled a visit at my convenience. The plumber was professional, friendly, and fixed the problem efficiently. He took the time to explain what had gone wrong and how to prevent future issues. I’m very impressed with the quality of work and the customer service. I’ll definitely be using K J Heating for any future plumbing needs and highly recommend them!

reviews.name: Lorna Prentice
reviews.text:
I had my radiators flushed and five valves replaced, and the service from start to finish was exceptional. The plumbers arrived exactly on time, were courteous throughout, and worked in a very clean and professional manner. They explained everything clearly, took great care in my home, and the quality of their work was outstanding.

A truly sterling job — highly recommended.

reviews.name: Philip Gutierrez
reviews.text: Excellent service. Tried to fix a Vailant boiler myself. Worked for a few days, but then no heating. Decided to call in KJ Heating. Steve and Ben were very friendly and efficient. They turned up the same day I called, to look and identify the problem, which they did very well. Steve returned the next day, and due to the age of the boiler had to change out the room thermostat for one that is compatable. Now workng perfectly. Would recommend this company to anyone looking for a reliable heating engineer.

reviews.name: Dawn Murphy
reviews.text: Excellent prompt and efficient service. Came and solved my leak problem within 24 hours of me calling. Gave great advice to prevent future problems.

reviews.name: Sang Bui
reviews.text: Plumber arrived same day very fast efficient repair in loft where there was a leak fixed the job professionally and would recommend best service

reviews.name: Kunal Manocha
reviews.text: Plumber unblocked our drain very efficiently. Great service would recommend.

reviews.name: demi park
reviews.text: The plumber was very helpful to get my wachine machine fixed and explained all the instructions and how to use it!!! Would recommend the company!! Also fixed my leaked in time for Christmas

reviews.name: krzysztof ratomski
reviews.text:
Professional plumbing service.
The plumber arrived same day fix my leak
Installed all new pieces.
I highly recommend
Thank you

reviews.name: Ami S
reviews.text: Had a blocked sink. I was able to schedule a last minute plumber at 7.30am, response was prompt, and booking was confirmed for my preferred time. Their service was professional and hassle free. I’d definitely be using their services in the future. Thank you!

reviews.name: geetan santhiapillai
reviews.text: Very good customer service, high quality work at a great price.

reviews.name: Matthew Brown
reviews.text: He came quickly when we have had an emergency and he always provided a great Service, would highly recommend !

reviews.name: Harshbir sangha
reviews.text: Had a water leak in what is an old metal pipe underneath the bathroom floor. Bal responded quickly to the call (late on Saturday evening) and helped control the leak straightaway. He returned back the next day (as agreed dot on the clock) with the right parts to fix the leak. It was tricky pipework with all sorts of access issues, but Bal found the way to fix it. Very professional, punctual and more importantly excellent quality work.

reviews.name: Karol
reviews.text: Great Service. Overall very knowledgeable and is going extra mile to complete given task. Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Luke Addams-Fallon
reviews.text: Excellent and the business name says it all. A supreme service. We had a very complex plumbing issue that other plumbers were unable to fix. Bal (Supreme Plumbers) was straightforward and honest- gave us options and solved our issue. Great!

reviews.name: STREATHAMHILL
reviews.text: I am a repeat customer of The Plumber, it’s so nice to be able to trust the plumbers coming out to you. We lost our hot water over Christmas and Elliot came out, he was very transparent about the cost, what needed done and why and he cleaned up after the work was completed. We felt comfortable with him, he was professional and kind. And we have hot water back! I thoroughly recommend this company

reviews.name: Robert Phillips
reviews.text: Excellent service and consultation, they fixed a leaky sink drainage for me, would definitely use again.
